atk-abh03a35:2_0: 857-862. Idāni asañciccakathā nāma hoti. Tattha “ānantariyavatthūni nāma garūni bhāriyāni,
atk-abh03a35:2_1: tasmā asañciccāpi tesu vatthūsu vikopitesu ānantariko hotī”ti yesaṁ laddhi, seyyathāpi
atk-abh03a35:2_2: ekaccānaṁ uttarāpathakānaṁ; te sandhāya asañciccāti pucchā sakavādissa, laddhivasena
atk-abh03a35:2_3: paṭiññā itarassa. Atha naṁ “yasmā ānantariyakammaṁ nāma kammapathappattaṁ. Yadi ca
atk-abh03a35:2_4: asañcicca kammapathabhedo siyā, avasesā pāṇātipātādayopi asañcicca bhaveyyu”nti codanatthaṁ
atk-abh03a35:2_5: asañciccapāṇaṁ hantvātiādimāha. Itaro tathārūpāya laddhiyā abhāvena paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a35:2_6: Sesaṁ yathāpāḷimeva niyyāti. Na vattabbaṁ mātughātakoti pucchā paravādissa, rogapaṭikārādikāle
atk-abh03a35:2_7: asañcicca ghātaṁ sandhāya paṭiññā sakavādissa. Nanu mātā jīvitā voropitāti pañhepi
atk-abh03a35:2_8: asañcicca voropitaṁ sandhāya paṭiññā sakavādisseva. Evaṁ adhippāyaṁ pana aggahetvā
atk-abh03a35:2_9: hañcīti laddhipatiṭṭhāpanaṁ itarassa. Taṁ ayoniso patiṭṭhāpitattā appatiṭṭhitameva.
atk-abh03a35:2_10: Pitughātakādīsupi eseva nayo. Saṅghabhedake pana dhammasaññiṁ sandhāya saṅghabhedo
atk-abh03a35:2_11: ānantarikoti pucchā sakavādissa, “saṅghaṁ samaggaṁ bhetvāna, kappaṁ nirayamhi paccatī”ti
atk-abh03a35:2_12: vacanaṁ ayoniso gahetvā paṭiññā paravādissa. Puna sabbeti puṭṭho sakapakkhe dhammasaññiṁ
atk-abh03a35:2_13: sandhāya paṭikkhipati, parapakkhe dhammasaññiṁ sandhāya paṭijānāti. Dhammasaññīti
atk-abh03a35:2_14: pañhadvayepi eseva nayo. Nanu vuttaṁ bhagavatāti suttaṁ ekanteneva dhammavādissa
atk-abh03a35:2_15: ānantarikabhāvadassanatthaṁ vuttaṁ. Āpāyiko nerayikoti gāthāyapi adhammavādīyeva
atk-abh03a35:2_16: adhippeto. Itaro pana adhippāyaṁ aggahetvā laddhiṁ patiṭṭhapeti. Sā ayoniso patiṭṭhāpitattā appatiṭṭhitāyevāti.
atk-abh03a35:5_0: 863-865. Idāni ñāṇakathā nāma hoti. Tattha duvidhaṁ ñāṇaṁ – lokiyañca lokuttarañca.
atk-abh03a35:5_1: Lokiyaṁ samāpattiñāṇampi hoti dānādivasena pavattaṁ kammassakatañāṇampi; lokuttaraṁ
atk-abh03a35:5_2: saccaparicchedakaṁ maggañāṇampi phalañāṇampi. Imaṁ pana vibhāgaṁ akatvā “saccaparicchedakameva
atk-abh03a35:5_3: ñāṇaṁ na itaraṁ, tasmā natthi puthujjanassa ñāṇa”nti yesaṁ laddhi, seyyathāpi hetuvādānaṁ,
atk-abh03a35:5_4: te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Paññātiādi ñāṇavevacanadassanatthaṁ
atk-abh03a35:5_5: vuttaṁ. Tenetaṁ dīpeti – yadi tassa ñāṇaṁ natthi, paññādayopi natthi. Atha paññādayo
atk-abh03a35:5_6: atthi, ñāṇampi atthi. Kasmā? Paññādīnaṁ ñāṇato anaññattāti. Paṭhamaṁ jhānantiādi
atk-abh03a35:5_7: samāpattiñāṇassa dassanatthaṁ vuttaṁ. Dānaṁ dadeyyātiādi kammassakatañāṇassa. Dukkhaṁ
atk-abh03a35:5_8: parijānātīti lokuttaramaggañāṇameva dīpeti, na ca lokuttarameva ñāṇanti.
atk-abh03a35:8_0: 866. Idāni nirayapālakathā nāma hoti. Tattha “niraye nerayikakammāneva nirayapālarūpavasena
atk-abh03a35:8_1: vadhenti, natthi nirayapālā nāma sattā”ti yesaṁ laddhi, seyyathāpi andhakānaṁ; te
atk-abh03a35:8_2: sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Atha naṁ “yadi tattha nirayapālā na
atk-abh03a35:8_3: siyuṁ, kammakāraṇāpi na bhaveyyuṁ. Kāraṇikesu hi sati kāraṇā”ti codetuṁ natthi nirayesūtiādimāha.
atk-abh03a35:9_0: 867-868.Atthi manussesūti paccakkhena ñāpanatthaṁ. Yathā hi manussesu sati kāraṇikesu
atk-abh03a35:9_1: kāraṇā, evaṁ tatthāpīti ayamettha adhippāyo. Atthi nirayesūti pucchā paravādissa,
atk-abh03a35:9_2: paṭiññā itarassa. Na vessabhū nopi ca pettirājāti paravādinā sakasamayato suttaṁ
atk-abh03a35:9_3: ābhataṁ. Taṁ pana sāsanāvacarikanti sakavādinā anuññātaṁ. Tattha vessabhūti eko devo.
atk-abh03a35:9_4: Pettirājāti pettivisaye petamahiddhiko. Somādayo pākaṭā eva. Idaṁ vuttaṁ hoti – attano
atk-abh03a35:9_5: kammehi ito paṇunnaṁ paralokaṁ pattaṁ purisaṁ na ete vessabhūādayo hananti. Yehi
atk-abh03a35:9_6: pana so kammehi tattha paṇunno, tāni sakāni kammāniyeva naṁ tattha hanantīti kammassakataṁ
atk-abh03a35:9_7: dīpeti, na nirayapālānaṁ abhāvaṁ. Sakavādinā pana tamenaṁ, bhikkhaveti ābhatāni suttapadāni nītatthānevāti.
atk-abh03a35:12_0: 869-871. Idāni tiracchānakathā nāma hoti. Tattha devesu erāvaṇādayo devaputtā hatthivaṇṇaṁ
atk-abh03a35:12_1: assavaṇṇaṁ vikubbanti, natthi tattha tiracchānagatā. Yesaṁ pana tiracchānavaṇṇino
atk-abh03a35:12_2: devaputte disvā “atthi devesu tiracchānagatā”ti laddhi, seyyathāpi andhakānaṁ ; te
atk-abh03a35:12_3: sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Atha naṁ “yadi devayoniyaṁ tiracchānagatā
atk-abh03a35:12_4: siyuṁ, tiracchānayoniyampi devā siyu”nti codetuṁ atthi tiracchānagatesūtiādimāha.
atk-abh03a35:12_5: Kīṭātiādi yesaṁ so abhāvaṁ icchati, te dassetuṁ vuttaṁ. Erāvaṇoti pañhe tassa atthitāya
atk-abh03a35:12_6: paṭiññā sakavādissa, na tiracchānagatassa. Hatthibandhātiādi “yadi tattha hatthiādayo
atk-abh03a35:12_7: siyuṁ, hatthibandhādayopi siyu”nti codanatthaṁ vuttaṁ. Tattha yāvasikāti yavassa
atk-abh03a35:12_8: dāyakā. Kāraṇikāti hatthācariyādayo, yehi te nānāvidhaṁ kāraṇaṁ kareyyuṁ. Bhattakārakāti
atk-abh03a35:12_9: hatthiādīnaṁ bhattarandhakā. Na hevanti tathā anicchanto paṭikkhipatīti.
atk-abh03a35:15_0: 872-875. Idāni maggakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṁ “pubbeva kho panassa kāyakammaṁ
atk-abh03a35:15_1: vacīkammaṁ ājīvo suparisuddho hotī”ti idañceva suttaṁ sammāvācākammantājīvānañca
atk-abh03a35:15_2: cittavippayuttataṁ nissāya “nippariyāyena pañcaṅgikova maggo”ti laddhi, seyyathāpi
atk-abh03a35:15_3: mahisāsakānaṁ, te sandhāya pañcaṅgikoti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Sammāvācā
atk-abh03a35:15_4: maggaṅgaṁ, sā ca na maggotiādi parasamayavasena vuttaṁ. Parasamayasmiñhi sammāvācādayo
atk-abh03a35:15_5: maggaṅganti āgatā. Rūpattā pana maggo na hotīti vaṇṇitā. Sammādiṭṭhi maggaṅgantiādi
atk-abh03a35:15_6: maggaṅgassa amaggatā nāma natthīti dassanatthaṁ vuttaṁ. Pubbeva kho panassāti sutte
atk-abh03a35:15_7: parisuddhasīlassa maggabhāvanā nāma hoti, na itarassāti āgamaniyapaṭipadāya visuddhibhāvadassanatthaṁ
atk-abh03a35:15_8: “kāyakammaṁ vacīkammaṁ ājīvo suparisuddho hotī”ti vuttaṁ, na imehi vinā pañcaṅgikabhāvadassanatthaṁ.
atk-abh03a35:15_9: Tenevāha “evamassāyaṁ ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchatī”ti. Sakavādinā
atk-abh03a35:18_0: 876-877. Idāni ñāṇakathā nāma hoti. Tattha dhammacakkappavattane dvādasākārañāṇaṁ
atk-abh03a35:18_1: sandhāya “dvādasavatthukaṁ ñāṇaṁ lokuttara”nti yesaṁ laddhi, seyyathāpi pubbaseliyānaṁ,
atk-abh03a35:18_2: te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Atha naṁ “sace taṁ dvādasavatthukaṁ,
atk-abh03a35:18_3: dvādasahi maggañāṇehi bhavitabba”nti codetuṁ dvādasātiādimāha. Itaro maggassa ekattaṁ
atk-abh03a35:18_4: sandhāya paṭikkhipati, ekekasmiṁ sacce saccañāṇakiccañāṇakatañāṇānaṁ vasena ñāṇanānattaṁ
atk-abh03a35:18_5: sandhāya paṭijānāti. Dvādasa sotāpattimaggātiādīsupi eseva nayo. Nanu vuttaṁ bhagavatāti
atk-abh03a35:18_6: suttaṁ saddhiṁ pubbabhāgaparabhāgehi ñāṇanānattaṁ dīpeti, na ariyamaggassa dvādasa
